lead_paragraph: GORDON--Samuel L.,M.D., was born January 21, 1918 in Atlanta, GA. He died in Lantana, FL on June 28, 2016. He was the son of the late Jacob B. and Sadie G. Gordon, and brother of Jack Jr. Loving husband of Nancy Willstatter, father to Sam, Jr., Jack, and Peter. Caring grandfather, uncle, cousin, and generous friend. Long term resident of Hartsdale, NY. New Haven, VT vacationer. A Georgia boy comes home to rest. Graduated Boys High School, Emory University and Medical School. WWII volunteer, U.S. Navy Flight Surgeon in U.S. and South Pacific. Thorough and careful ENT specialist physician who loved his patients. Avid outdoorsman, horseman, amateur pilot, happy hunter, expert fisherman, and world traveler. In lieu of flowers, memorial donations may be made to your favorite charity. A graveside service will be held Thursday, June 30, 2016 at 9am at Historic Oakland Cemetery, Atlanta, GA. 1/3
